column24: Pixel ([[Pixel|GP]]/s){{efn|name=PixelFillrate}}{{efn|As the GTX 1070 has one of the four GP104 GPCs disabled in the die
column25: its frontend is only able to rasterize 48 pixels per clock. Analogically
column26: the GTX 1060 features only two GPCs on its GP106 die
column27: meaning that its frontend can only rasterize 32 pixels per clock. The remaining backend ROPs can still be used for tasks such as MSAA.}}
